creator: Ledger
descriptionHtml:
SECURELY MANAGE 25 CRYPTO ASSETS FROM YOUR SMARTPHONE
Ledger Live is the digital companion to your Ledger hardware wallet.
Securely manage 25 crypto assets, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple, Tezos, Litecoin and more, directly from your smartphone. Check your real-time balance, manage crypto transactions and grow your assets in one-single app.

Ledger Live is backed up by the most popular hardware wallet on the market, to provide you maximum security when managing your cryptocurrencies. Only you hold the private keys that control access to your assets. And you can store, send and receive without ever leaving the security of your wallet.

NEW! Send, receive and check your Stellar (XLM) balance directly in Ledger Live!

CRYPTO ASSETS SUPPORTED
You can manage 25 coins directly in Ledger Live, but also ERC-20s and TRCs
Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Tezos (XTZ), Tron (TRX), Litecoin (LTC), Stellar (XLM), Dash (DASH), Ethereum Classic (ETC), Zcash (ZEC), Dogecoin (DOGE), Bitcoin Gold (BTG), Qtum (QTUM), Decred (DCR), Digibyte (DGB), Stratis (STRAT), Komodo (KMD), PivX (PIVX), Horizen( ZEN), Peercoin (PPC), Vertcoin (VTC), Viacoin (VIA), Stakenet (XSN), Stealth (XST).

BACKED UP BY LEDGER HARDWARE WALLET
Leave your fear of hacks behind!
A hardware wallet is an offline, cold storage secure device, enabling you to protect the private keys giving access to your funds. With our solution combining hardware and software wallet, your private keys always remain safe in a certified secure element and remain available everywhere you go.
Connect your Ledger Nano X or Ledger Nano S to your Ledger Live app and start enjoying the experience.

CHECK YOUR BALANCE IN REAL-TIME
- Overview of all your cryptocurrency portfolio at a glance
- Automatic balances update
- See the asset distribution in your portfolio
- Full transactions history


TRANSACTIONS
Send and receive Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP) and more digital currencies
Intuitive interface to manage your funds in a few taps
Always validate your transactions with your Hardware Wallet
Select custom fees

SET UP YOUR LEDGER DEVICE
Follow the step-by-step onboarding in Ledger Live
Install applications on your device, among our catalog of compatible assets
Create accounts to manage the 25 crypto assets supported by Ledger Live

DELEGATE YOUR ASSETS
Delegate all your Tezos accounts
Freeze and vote with your Tron assets
Get rewards while hodling

COMPATIBILITY
Ledger Live application is fully compatible with the Ledger Nano X via Bluetooth connection, and with the Ledger Nano S via USB. You can also import your account from Ledger Live desktop and use the mobile application to consult your accounts.

The Ledger Live mobile application will allow you to safely manage Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Litecoin (LTC) and 21 other cryptocurrency, without worrying about hacks or thefts.
descriptionShort: The perfect companion to your Ledger devices.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Please update your Nano applications for an important update. Read more on donjon.ledger.com

- Support Native Segwit for LTC and DGB
- Better documented Native Segwit and Segwit accounts
- Updated ERC-20 list
- Updated XRPL node
- Fixed minor interface bugs

title: Ledger Live

creator: Ledger
descriptionHtml:
BUY, SECURE & MANAGE YOUR CRYPTO FROM YOUR SMARTPHONE
Combine a Ledger Hardware Wallet with the Ledger Live app to secure all your crypto, buy, exchange and earn interest. All in one place. Directly from your smartphone.
No detours anymore: you only need one place to buy, secure and manage your crypto, without ever leaving the security of your hardware wallet.


BUY CRYPTO
Buy crypto directly in Ledger Live, using our partner Coinify. Pick your crypto among Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Bitcoin Cash (BCH) and Dash (DASH) and buy it using Credit Card or Bank Transfer. Just log into Ledger Live and exchange your Euro or Dollar for the cryptocurrency of your choice.
Once you bought your crypto through Ledger Live, it will immediately be sent to the safety of your hardware wallet.


SECURE
Ledger Live is backed up by Ledger Hardware Wallet - the most secure way to store your crypto.
When you own crypto what really matters is the key that gives access to your coins - your private key. The person that has access to this key owns the associated coins and can do whatever they want with them.
We created a solution that enables you to secure and own this private key. Our hardware wallet combined with Ledger Live app offers maximum security and full control over your crypto.

EARN INTEREST
You can grow your assets directly from Ledger Live.
You can stake your Tezos (XTZ), Tron (TRX) or Cosmos (ATOM) in Ledger Live. This enables you to receive crypto rewards while keeping your assets secured in your hardware wallet. Average annual yield is around 7-8%. Let your crypto do the work for you and receive passive income.

MANAGE YOUR CRYPTO
Check your balance in real-time directly in the app. You have an overview of all your cryptocurrency portfolio at a glance and of all your transactions history.
Send and Receive Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP) and more digital currencies with Ledger Live. Every action is validated on your hardware wallet for optimal security.


ALL YOUR CRYPTO IN ONE PLACE
You can manage 26 coins directly in Ledger Live
Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Litecoin (LTC), Tezos (XTZ), Stellar (XLM), Tron (TRX), Ethereum Classic (ETC), Dash (DASH), Zcash (ZEC), Dogecoin (DOGE), Digibyte (DGB), Bitcoin Gold (BTG), Decred (DCR), Qtum (QTUM), Komodo (KMD), Horizen( ZEN), Stratis (STRAT), PivX (PIVX), Peercoin (PPC), Vertcoin (VTC), Viacoin (VIA), Stakenet (XSN), Stealth (XST).
You can also manage an extensive list of ERC-20 tokens, TRC-10 and TRC-20 tokens using our app.

SET UP YOUR LEDGER DEVICE
Install applications on your device, among our catalog of compatible assets or create accounts to manage the crypto assets supported.

COMPATIBILITY
Ledger Live application is fully compatible with the Ledger Nano X via Bluetooth connection and with the Ledger Nano S using an OTG kit.


Buy, Secure, Manage and Grow your crypto assets - including Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Litecoin (LTC), Tezos (XTZ) - through one single-app and your Ledger hardware wallet, without worrying about security.
descriptionShort: Buy, Secure & Manage Crypto

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Features:
- New warning to when the balance is not yet confirmed if an operation is still pending confirmation
- New warning for outdated apps

Bug fixes:
- Ethereum: Better gasLimit estimation
- Fix on ETH Classic balance and amount

RBF transactions:
- Fix a bug creating wrong balance for cancelled RBF transactions
- Fix on the Send flow to not use RBF transaction output when they are not confirmed
- RBF to be disabled by default for a regular Send

title: Ledger Live - Bitcoin & Ethereum wallet

creator: Ledger
descriptionHtml:
The Ledger Live app is finally available for Android!

Ledger Live is the perfect mobile companion for your Ledger Hardware wallet. The application will allow you to manage your crypto assets (Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple and many others) securely, but also to follow your portfolio, wherever you are, whether you have your Ledger Hardware wallet with you or not.

Our app includes:

Easy onboarding
- Configure your Ledger Nano X easily, with Ledger Live’s step-by-step onboarding, which will guide you during the onboarding
- Import your accounts from Ledger Live Desktop
- Check the authenticity of your Ledger device
- Secure the access to your app with a password lock or biometric authentification

Install new currencies
- Install & remove currencies from over 1,100 compatible assets
- Discover new apps

Manage your accounts
- Unlimited accounts for each compatible currency
- Full transactions history
- Detailed information for each transaction
- Custom settings for each account
- One-click account overview
- Import & restore accounts

Check your balance in real-time
- Overview of all your assets
- Global countervalue on the dashboard, enabling you to check the total value of your assets at a glance
- Automatic balances update
- Smart filters (week, month, year)

Send and receive funds
- Intuitive send and receive flows
- Easy step-by-step assistants
- On-device transaction confirmation
- Visual validation of addresses
- Support of custom fees

Update your devices
- Benefit from the latest security features with integrated firmware update of your Ledger device

Personalize your app
- Create your Ledger Live profile to customize your app settings (Countervalue, Rate provider …)
descriptionShort: The perfect companion to your Ledger devices.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New features

- Added support for Algorand (ALGO) assets directly in Ledger Live!
- Manage your Algorand accounts, send, receive, and earn rewards!
- Full Bitcoin Cash CashAddr support
- Changed font as per Desktop application
- Improved crypto and fiat currency formatting
- Added operation type (Send, receive, stake, etc.)

Fixes

- Multiple UI bugs on Cosmos integration

title: Ledger Live

creator: Ledger
descriptionHtml:
The Ledger Live app is finally available for Android!

Ledger Live is the perfect mobile companion for your Ledger Hardware wallet. The application will allow you to manage your crypto assets (Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple and many others) securely, but also to follow your portfolio, wherever you are, whether you have your Ledger Hardware wallet with you or not.

Our app includes:

Easy onboarding
- Configure your Ledger Nano X easily, with Ledger Live’s step-by-step onboarding, which will guide you during the onboarding
- Import your accounts from Ledger Live Desktop
- Check the authenticity of your Ledger device
- Secure the access to your app with a password lock or biometric authentification

Install new currencies
- Install & remove currencies from over 1,100 compatible assets
- Discover new apps

Manage your accounts
- Unlimited accounts for each compatible currency
- Full transactions history
- Detailed information for each transaction
- Custom settings for each account
- One-click account overview
- Import & restore accounts

Check your balance in real-time
- Overview of all your assets
- Global countervalue on the dashboard, enabling you to check the total value of your assets at a glance
- Automatic balances update
- Smart filters (week, month, year)

Send and receive funds
- Intuitive send and receive flows
- Easy step-by-step assistants
- On-device transaction confirmation
- Visual validation of addresses
- Support of custom fees

Update your devices
- Benefit from the latest security features with integrated firmware update of your Ledger device

Personalize your app
- Create your Ledger Live profile to customize your app settings (Countervalue, Rate provider …)
descriptionShort: The perfect companion to your Ledger devices.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Features

- Sell crypto through our partner.
- Discreet mode to hide your balance.
- Added address paste button when sending crypto.

Fixes

- Restore sticky header on Portfolio tab.
- Swap and Lend fixes.

title: Ledger Live

creator: Ledger
descriptionHtml:
The Ledger Live app is finally available for Android!

Ledger Live is the perfect mobile companion for your Ledger Hardware wallet. The application will allow you to manage your crypto assets (Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple and many others) securely, but also to follow your portfolio, wherever you are, whether you have your Ledger Hardware wallet with you or not.

Our app includes:

Easy onboarding
- Configure your Ledger Nano X easily, with Ledger Live’s step-by-step onboarding, which will guide you during the onboarding
- Import your accounts from Ledger Live Desktop
- Check the authenticity of your Ledger device
- Secure the access to your app with a password lock or biometric authentification

Install new currencies
- Install & remove currencies from over 1,100 compatible assets
- Discover new apps

Manage your accounts
- Unlimited accounts for each compatible currency
- Full transactions history
- Detailed information for each transaction
- Custom settings for each account
- One-click account overview
- Import & restore accounts

Check your balance in real-time
- Overview of all your assets
- Global countervalue on the dashboard, enabling you to check the total value of your assets at a glance
- Automatic balances update
- Smart filters (week, month, year)

Send and receive funds
- Intuitive send and receive flows
- Easy step-by-step assistants
- On-device transaction confirmation
- Visual validation of addresses
- Support of custom fees

Update your devices
- Benefit from the latest security features with integrated firmware update of your Ledger device

Personalize your app
- Create your Ledger Live profile to customize your app settings (Countervalue, Rate provider …)
descriptionShort: The perfect companion to your Ledger devices.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Features
- View your NFTs on rainbow.me integration on the Discover section
- Zerion now on Live's Discover section as well

Fixes
- Polkadot operations better handled

title: Ledger Live

creator: Ledger
descriptionHtml:
THE SECURE PLATFORM FOR YOUR CRYPTO WORLD

Ledger is the most secure way to manage your crypto and digital assets, empowering you through our Ledger ecosystem: a hardware wallet, combined with our Ledger Live app, creating the best security and accessibility of your assets.
Secure, Buy, Sell, Swap, Grow your crypto - and more. All-in-one place.

SECURE & CONTROL
Ledger Live works together with Ledger Hardware Wallet to offer full control over your crypto in a totally secure environment. Ledger hardware wallet keeps your private key offline and protected while Ledger Live app lets you manage your crypto and access key services.

UNLOCK THE WORLD OF DIGITAL ASSETS WITH ONE APP
Through Ledger Live, access a world of smart services to manage your crypto - and more

BUY & SELL CRYPTO, SECURELY
Buy and Sell crypto through Ledger Live with our partners.
You can buy Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Tether (USDT), Polkadot (DOT), Aave (AAVE) and more than 40 other crypto, by Credit Card or Bank Transfers, with the currency of your choice.
Once bought, your crypto will immediately be sent to the safety of your hardware wallet.
You can also sell Bitcoin through Ledger Live.

SWAP CRYPTO
Exchange one crypto for another through Ledger Live with our partners, in a secure and fast environment.
You can swap more than 100 different coins & tokens on our application, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Tether, Bitcoin Cash, Litecoin. All-in-one place and from the security of your hardware wallet.

ACCESS DEFI APPS & SERVICES
Easily grow your ETH with our partner Lido, manage your DeFi portfolio with Zerion, access DEXs aggregators like ParaSwap and 1inch. And visualize your NFTs secured by your hardware wallet with Rainbow.me. All that from the safe ecosystem of Ledger Live.

PAY USING YOUR CRYPTO
Order your CL Card, powered by Ledger on the app and pay with your crypto whenever you want. The card is built to be compatible with your Ledger wallet.

MANAGE YOUR PORTFOLIO
Check your balance in real-time: you have an overview of all your cryptocurrency portfolio and of all your transactions history.
Send and Receive Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Tether (USDT), Ripple (XRP) and more digital currencies with Ledger Live. Every action is validated on your hardware wallet for optimal security.

List of crypto supported:
Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Binance Coin (BNB), Ripple (XRP), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Litecoin (LTC), Tezos (XTZ), Stellar (XLM), Tron (TRX), Ethereum Classic (ETC), Dash (DASH), Cosmos (ATOM), Zcash (ZEC), Dogecoin (DOGE), Digibyte (DGB), Bitcoin Gold (BTG), Decred (DCR), Qtum (QTUM), Algorand (ALGO), Komodo (KMD), Horizen (ZEN), PivX (PIVX), Peercoin (PPC), Vertcoin (VTC), Viacoin (VIA), Stakenet (XSN), ERC-20 and BEP-20 tokens.

COMPATIBILITY
Ledger Live mobile application is fully compatible with the Ledger Nano X via Bluetooth connection and with the Ledger Nano S using an OTG kit.

Secure, Buy, Sell, Swap, Grow and Manage your Crypto - including Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Tether (USDT), Ripple (XRP), Litecoin (LTC), Tezos (XTZ) - through a single app and your Ledger hardware wallet, without worrying about security.

Disclaimer: Buy, swap, lend, and other crypto transaction services are provided by third-party partners. Ledger provides no advice or recommendations on use of these third-party services.
descriptionShort: The secure platform for your crypto world. Buy, sell, swap, grow your assets.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Features
- Polygon support
- Elrond support
- ETH NFT support as experimental feature
- Taproot support as experimental feature


Fixes

- First pairing of Nano X via Bluetooth doesn't trigger an error anymore.

title: Ledger Live - Crypto Wallet

creator: Ledger
descriptionHtml:
From the company that produced the world’s most secure crypto hardware device comes the world’s most accessible and complete Web3 wallet: Ledger Live. It offers everything the crypto newbie or crypto native could ever need, all in one place.

Ledger Live lets newcomers and crypto pros follow the market, manage and grow their DeFi portfolio, and support their favorite NFT maker by showing off their collection.

Here’s everything you can do through Ledger Live:

BUY CRYPTO
Buy crypto through Ledger Live with our partners*.
You can buy Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Tether (USDT), Polkadot (DOT), Aave (AAVE) and more than 40 other crypto, by Credit Card or Bank Transfers, with the currency of your choice.
Once bought, your crypto will immediately be sent to the safety of your hardware wallet.
You can also sell Bitcoin through Ledger Live.

SWAP CRYPTO
Exchange one crypto for another through Ledger Live with our partners*, in a secure and fast environment. You can swap more than 5000 different coins & tokens on our application, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, BNB, Tether, Dogecoin, Litecoin.

ACCESS DEFI APPS & SERVICES
Easily grow your ETH with our partner Lido, stake DOT, ATOM, XTZ**, manage your DeFi portfolio with Zerion, access DEXs aggregators like ParaSwap and 1inch. All that from the safe ecosystem of Ledger Live.

MANAGE NFTs
Easily collect, visualize and send your Ethereum NFTs secured by your hardware wallet.

CHECK CRYPTO MARKET PRICES
Get a crypto market watchlist directly in your Ledger Live app: price, volume, market cap, dominance, supply. Everything you need to build your portfolio.

PAY USING YOUR CRYPTO
Order your CL Card, powered by Ledger on the app and pay with your crypto whenever you want. The card is built to be compatible with your Ledger wallet.

List of crypto supported:
Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Binance Coin (BNB), Ripple (XRP), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Litecoin (LTC), Tezos (XTZ), Stellar (XLM), Polkadot (DOT), Tron (TRX), Polygon (MATIC), Ethereum Classic (ETC), Dash (DASH), Cosmos (ATOM), Elrond (EGLD), Zcash (ZEC), Dogecoin (DOGE), Digibyte (DGB), Bitcoin Gold (BTG), Decred (DCR), Qtum (QTUM), Algorand (ALGO), Komodo (KMD), Horizen (ZEN), PivX (PIVX), Peercoin (PPC), Vertcoin (VTC), Viacoin (VIA), Stakenet (XSN), ERC-20 and BEP-20 tokens.


COMPATIBILITY
Ledger Live mobile application is fully compatible with the Ledger Nano X via Bluetooth connection and with the Ledger Nano S using an OTG kit.

*Buy, swap, lend, and other crypto transaction services are provided by third-party partners. Ledger provides no advice or recommendations on use of these third-party services.

**Rewards are not guaranteed. Ledger provides no advice or recommendations on use of staking services.
descriptionShort: Buy, stake, swap and sell Bitcoin, Ethereum & more, manage NFT, access DeFi

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Features
- Market : Monitor all cryptocurrency prices direclty in Ledger Live!
- NFTs : View, Send and Receive all your NFTs on Ethereum !

Fixes
- Wallet Connect

descriptionHtml:
From the company that produced the world’s most secure crypto hardware device comes the world’s most accessible and complete Web3 wallet: Ledger Live. It offers everything the crypto newbie or crypto native could ever need, all in one place.

Ledger Live lets newcomers and crypto pros follow the market, manage and grow their DeFi portfolio, and support their favorite NFT maker by showing off their collection.

Here’s everything you can do through Ledger Live:

BUY CRYPTO
Buy crypto through Ledger Live with our partners*.
You can buy Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Tether (USDT), Polkadot (DOT), Aave (AAVE) and more than 40 other crypto, by Credit Card or Bank Transfers, with the currency of your choice.
Once bought, your crypto will immediately be sent to the safety of your hardware wallet.
You can also sell Bitcoin through Ledger Live.

SWAP CRYPTO
Exchange one crypto for another through Ledger Live with our partners*, in a secure and fast environment. You can swap more than 5000 different coins & tokens on our application, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, BNB, Tether, Dogecoin, Litecoin.

ACCESS DEFI APPS & SERVICES
Easily grow your ETH with our partner Lido, stake DOT, ATOM, XTZ**, manage your DeFi portfolio with Zerion, access DEXs aggregators like ParaSwap and 1inch. All that from the safe ecosystem of Ledger Live.

MANAGE NFTs
Easily collect, visualize and send your Ethereum NFTs secured by your hardware wallet.

CHECK CRYPTO MARKET PRICES
Get a crypto market watchlist directly in your Ledger Live app: price, volume, market cap, dominance, supply. Everything you need to build your portfolio.

PAY USING YOUR CRYPTO
Order your CL Card, powered by Ledger on the app and pay with your crypto whenever you want. The card is built to be compatible with your Ledger wallet.

List of crypto supported:
Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Binance Coin (BNB), Ripple (XRP), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Litecoin (LTC), Tezos (XTZ), Stellar (XLM), Polkadot (DOT), Tron (TRX), Polygon (MATIC), Ethereum Classic (ETC), Dash (DASH), Cosmos (ATOM), Elrond (EGLD), Zcash (ZEC), Dogecoin (DOGE), Digibyte (DGB), Bitcoin Gold (BTG), Decred (DCR), Qtum (QTUM), Algorand (ALGO), Komodo (KMD), Horizen (ZEN), PivX (PIVX), Peercoin (PPC), Vertcoin (VTC), Viacoin (VIA), Stakenet (XSN), ERC-20 and BEP-20 tokens.


COMPATIBILITY
Ledger Live mobile application is fully compatible with the Ledger Nano X via Bluetooth connection and with the Ledger Nano S using an OTG kit.

*Buy, swap, lend, and other crypto transaction services are provided by third-party partners. Ledger provides no advice or recommendations on use of these third-party services.

**Rewards are not guaranteed. Ledger provides no advice or recommendations on use of staking services.
descriptionShort: Buy, stake, swap and sell Bitcoin, Ethereum & more, manage NFT, access DeFi

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Ledger Live Mobile now has a new look.

See what's new.

Features
- We added a nifty navbar so you can quickly toggle between different sections of the app.
- Portfolio is now Wallet. Manage your assets, keep the pace with the market, and more—all in one place.
- Starting today, Ledger Live supports CELO.
- Discover is now a hub where you can connect to 3rd party DApps and level up your knowledge with Ledger Academy.


Fixes
We fixed a host of small bugs that caused crashes.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We listened to your valuable input that helps us create a better experience for all of our customers, and we will continue to closely monitor it.

What's new:

Features
- Portfolio and asset charts are back
- What happens in the Market should stay there, Market gainers are now removed from Wallet
- Transaction history is now on the Wallet page
- Polygon NFTs support

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We’ve rolled out several new features and fixed a couple of annoying bugs. Here are the highlights of this release.
Features
-As of today, you can stake Solana (SOL) with Ledger Live Mobile. Earn passive income and grow your assets on the go.
-Staking Cosmos just got better and more secure with the new Ledger Validator Node.
-You can now update the firmware of your Ledger Nano using a USB cable.
Fixes
-We’ve shipped a couple of improvements and squashed some minor bugs.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
This version brings some sizzling features and includes bug fixes.

Features
Buying crypto with Ledger Live just got better. Now you can filter payment service providers based on the asset you want to purchase.
Send, receive, and buy Cardano (ADA) on the go.

Fixes
This patch includes a few bug fixes and minor performance improvements.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Here's a look at what's new in Ledger Live.

This release introduces a snappier way to receive crypto. Fewer clicks. Less hassle.
100 native Cardano tokens made their way to Ledger Live.
Speaking of new assets, we’ve added support for HBAR and Stellar USDC.
Delegating Solana or Cosmos stake just got better—the nifty new search bar helps you find validators easily and quickly.

To take advantage of these new features, be sure to update your Ledger Live app to the latest version.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Ledger Live 3.5 release introduced:

A snappier way to receive crypto,
100 native Cardano tokens,
Support for HBAR and Stellar USDC,
A nifty new search bar to help you find Solana or Cosmos validators quickly.

Unfortunately, it also included an annoying bug that occasionally caused the app to crash when adding an asset to generate its receiving address.

With the 3.5.1 release, we've patched this up and everything is now running smoothly again. Don't forget to update your app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Features
Ledger Live now supports right-to-left (RTL) languages, starting with Arabic.
We’ll be adding more RTL languages in the future, so keep an eye on our release notes.

As a reminder, you can change the language in the settings menu under General → Display language.

Fixes
We've fixed some issues that caused the countervalues of Cardano tokens to be displayed incorrectly.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
EIP-1559 is here. Now you can enjoy more predictable fees and reduced confirmation delays for Ethereum-based transactions. You can also avoid overpaying fees—specify the max fee you're willing to pay and get reimbursed if the transaction is processed at a lower price.

Don’t trust, verify. Ledger now supports the EIP-712 standard that will display data in signing prompts in a readable format instead of complex hexadecimal strings.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Features
You can now manage 100+ tokens on Cronos, Fantom, and Moonbeam networks with Ledger Live.

Ledger Live will no longer display zero-amount transactions in the transaction history. If you want to view zero-amount transactions, navigate to Settings -> Accounts -> Zero-amount transactions and flip the toggle switch to the on position.

Discover section now features NewsFeed that will keep you up-to-date with the latest crypto news and events.

Fixes
This release includes minor fixes.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Features

Managing your NFT collection in Ledger Live just got better. You can now filter your NFTs by blockchain. This will help you view all your NFTs for a specific blockchain in one glance.

This filter also provides easy access to your hidden NFT collections directly from the Gallery. You no longer need to go to Settings to unhide NFTs.

We’ve also made some UI improvements to help you view NFT details.

Fixes
Optimism is now Op Mainnet. We’ve made the name change in Ledger Live.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Feature
Gone are the days of unwanted NFTs in your gallery. Spam NFTs will now be filtered and removed automatically.

Note: Transactions related to scam NFTs won't be removed from your transaction history.

Fixes
Adding a NEAR (NEAR) account would result in an error. We’ve fixed this.

When sending Casper (CSPR), some addresses were rejected. This has been resolved.

Hiding tokens wouldn't remove their value from the portfolio balance. We've fixed this.

3.60.0

creator: Ledger
descriptionHtml:
From the company that produces the world's most secure crypto hardware wallets comes the Ledger Live app — the companion app to all your Ledger devices. It's everything you'll need to manage your crypto and NFTs, and to manage your Ledger devices.

Use Ledger Live to:

BUY CRYPTO
It is possible to buy and sell crypto through Ledger Live with our third-party service providers*.

SWAP CRYPTO
It is possible to exchange one crypto for another through Ledger Live with our third-party service providers*.

STAKE YOUR ASSETS
It is possible to stake ETH, ATOM, DOT, ALGO, XTZ, TRON through Ledger Live**.

MANAGE NFTs
Easily collect and visualize your Ethereum NFTs secured by your hardware wallet.

CHECK CRYPTO MARKET PRICES
Get a crypto market watchlist directly in your Ledger Live app: price, volume, market cap, dominance, supply.

PAY USING YOUR CRYPTO
Order your CL Card, powered by Ledger on the app and pay with your crypto whenever you want. The card is built to be compatible with your Ledger wallet.

List of crypto supported:
Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Binance Coin (BNB), Ripple (XRP), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Litecoin (LTC), Tezos (XTZ), Stellar (XLM), Polkadot (DOT), Tron (TRX), Polygon (MATIC), Ethereum Classic (ETC), Dash (DASH), Cosmos (ATOM), Elrond (EGLD), Zcash (ZEC), Dogecoin (DOGE), Digibyte (DGB), Bitcoin Gold (BTG), Decred (DCR), Qtum (QTUM), Algorand (ALGO), Komodo (KMD), Horizen (ZEN), PivX (PIVX), Peercoin (PPC), Vertcoin (VTC), Viacoin (VIA), Stakenet (XSN), ERC-20 and BEP-20 tokens.

COMPATIBILITY
Ledger Live mobile IOS application is fully compatible with the Ledger Nano X and Ledger Stax using Bluetooth connection.

*Crypto transaction services are provided by third-party providers. Ledger provides no advice or recommendations on use of these third-party services.

**Rewards are not guaranteed. Ledger provides no advice or recommendations on use of staking services.
descriptionShort: Buy, stake, swap and sell Bitcoin, Ethereum & more, manage NFT, access DeFi

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: This release includes small security improvements, UI tweaks, and minor bug fixes.
